Students will take courses in applied machine learning, data science, neuroscience, data engineering, and statistics.

articles.author: News Desk
articles.summary: Microsoft developed a demo with an AI-generated version of Quake II, a classic first-person shooter that was originally released in 1997. They used their Muse AI tool, which was previously shown in 2025 as something that can make gamevisuals and simulate gameplay. The demo represents an evolution of this technology, with a real -time, playable version where each frame is generated by the AI. It is still a work in progress, but it gives you an idea of what AI could do later to quickly test new games or save old ones.

articles.title: When AI images become ‘an insult to life itself'
articles.author: The Irish Times
articles.summary: On January 5th, 2021, OpenAI announced its new neural network Dall-E, a landmark network that could generate images from text. The examples shared in the post look low-tech to our 2025 eyes, but they were a huge achievement at the time.

articles.title: inZOI: Best Female Characters
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: InZOI's character creation tools make it possible to create any character you want. The possibilities are endless with the new tools provided by inZOi. It's a great tool for creating new characters. It is free and easy to use.

articles.title: Meta unveils new Llama-4 AI model to compete with ChatGPT, Gemini
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Mark Zuckerberg's Meta launched its latest generation of Llama (large language model) artificial intelligence models- Scout, Maverick and Behemoth on Saturday. The competition in the AI space is heating up between Google, OpenAI and other contenders such as Meta and others.

articles.title: ‘Quake II' Review (Microsoft AI Co-Pilot Edition): A Modern Tragedy
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Microsoft's Co-Pilot platform generates an AI'replica' of 1997's Quake 2. It's awful and it's based on a trick from Microsoft's AI platform. It is based on an AI trick from the Co-pilot platform.

articles.title: How To Use AI Lead Generation Tools To Get More Qualified Leads
articles.author: Scoop
articles.summary: AI enables faster and more accurate lead qualification. Businesses can prioritize their efforts effectively by quickly identifying leads most likely to convert and can focus on those who are likely to be successful. For more information, go to: http://www.justin.com/lead-qualification.

articles.title: AI Startup Deletes Entire Website After Researcher Finds Something Disgusting There
articles.author: Futurism
articles.summary: GenNomis went offline this week after a researcher discovered tens of thousands of AI-generated pornographic images created by Nudify. The photos were found in an unsecured database and included explicit images bearing the likeness of celebrities. The site was hacked.

articles.title: From ChatGPT to DeepSeek, a timely review of AI solutions
articles.author: Beijing News
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence (AI) has seen rapid growth, transforming industries and daily life. The development of AI is as fundamental as the creation of the microprocessor, the personal computer, the Internet, and the mobile phone. AI's capabilities continue to expand, driven by powerful companies investing heavily in research and development.

articles.title: Musk's Grok-3 slightly outperforms Chinese DeepSeek AI: Report
articles.author: Suryaa
articles.summary: Elon Musk-owned Grok and Chinese DeepSeek models stand at the forefront of AI capability. It was trained using only 2,000 NVIDIA H800 GPUs. It is a scaled-down, export-compliant alternative to the H100.
